title: Another Patch and Voli E is STILL bugged!!

embed.description: Start a camp with fear and you won't be able to damage it.

body:
Title: Volibear E-Bug
Server: ANY SERVER!!!
Type of Bug: in-game

**THIS BUG EXISTS SINCE over 3 MONTHS NOW!**

Details:
If you attack a jungle monster with Voli E (before any other skill or autoattack) monsters HP will reset for the duration of E.
This goes for Gromp/Blue/Wolves/Red/Krugs.
Raptors/Rift Scuttler/Minions seem to work.
If the monster already lost some HP from AA or other Skill, E works fine.

This bug happens EVERY time (10/10).
Regardless of items or level, Ranked or Normal.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lQeDBfhvTkQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2dueSySqTM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hZ30PiMrOrM

I will open new threads every patch until this bug is fixed!!

replies.body: Who's gonna CC a monster at level 1 before its basic attack is mid air anyway?

This is what I was thinking...why would you ever NOT auto the damn thing first for the free damage?  I'm actually okay with the game punishing you for not playing the game smart.  
  
I wonder if Fiddle or Nocturne has the same interaction if you use their fear on incoming?  I don't play them at all.

Hey Big Friendly Bear.. that's what the F stands for right? :P

So I'm taking a look at this, I can't promise it'll be fixed for 8.9 but it is on my radar now. 
I do apologize that this is how it was found, after multiple attempts by you and something
we should have caught anyways. So thank you for being on top of this and I will do my best
to have this fixed quickly. 

Thank you again for the post and the videos, really helps us figure things out over here.

-Ranger

What about Talon E Bug which makes you backflip or dont go where you pointed at? Its been a year.

Hey Kayra,

I'm looking at it, seems to be an issue with how it is reading environment on the map. 
This is going to be a bigger fix. This will also be a little bit on the lower end of priority things. 
It's not always a time issue, more of a cost of resources or who can actually fix it. This is an
engineer fix and will take a bit of time before they can look at it. But it is on our backlog and 
we do have eyes on it :)

Thanks for the post!

-Ranger

Hello Riot Ranger XIV.

I would love to ask if you could take a look at this bug report from a bit ago (only more than 12 months now) that some rioter forgot about.
I would REALLY apreciate it.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/xvAawLtH-gameplay-shaco-clone-ignores-player-input-after-killing-a-plant

Any questions feel free to ask please.
Thanks... I guess.

Hey Naimus,

The rioter didn't forget, they actually pointed me to you :) They care very much about the clean state 
of the game. The problem was closing the loop. I do not want to leave you hanging!

I have looked at your videos and the past posts, this is a bigger problem with our AI.
Currently this bug is not a priority so I can't promise you a fix date or even give you a shot in the dark.
What I can say is that it is on our backlog, it is a thing we are tracking. We do want to fix
every issue that pains our players, like this shaco clone bug.

I know this probably wasn't the response you wanted and I wish every post I made was,
It's fixed, looking clean! However sometimes I have news that isn't good.

I do appreciate the efforts of your videos and posts though, please don't feel I'm brushing you off.
Thank you again!

-Ranger

Hey Riot Ranger XIV

It's ok! unfortunately this response is actually more than I expected. So thank you very much!

sorry for taking your time, but other than Exgeniar who offered to fix some bugs, i saw no other context from riot on fixing Illaoi's bugs (other than maybe the W crit bug or the healthbar one). Do you have some, or is she placed along with Mordekaiser? I don't think her bugs are so hard to fix like the others (other than her E ones). For example there is the one that blocks the tentacle from attacking for 1 seconds if Illaoi W-s while the tentacle is spawning. This shouldn't be a hard fix right? If W-Tentacle Spawning = do nothing

What about this Sejuani bug that has been present _**since her rework?**_

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/61oVjJPE-sejuani-permafrost-bug

Hey Sonic!

I have tried to figure out this bug with Sejuani. If you can find me a 100% repro, that'd be fucking amazing.
I play a lot of Sej, and I've had it happen to me, but I can't make it happen on purpose. It feels super bad
but it is something I can't spend anymore time on til I get more leads unfortunately :(

-Ranger

Also, for what it's worth, it's nice to hear that this bug is known and on Riot's radar even if you don't have a fix for it.

It's better than thinking you were ignorant of it for years
It seems to interact with forced or restricted movement somehow, but that's all I've been able to divine
